xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes for Financial Results: 1. Profit before Tax excludes Share of net profit/ (loss) of associate and joint venture accounted for using equity method 2. Other income includes Gain/(loss) on sale of property, plant and equipment Notes for Cash Flow: Net cash flows from (used in) operating activities 1. Profit before Tax excludes Share of net profit/ (loss) of associate and joint venture accounted for using equity method and Income tax expense . 2. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in trade receivables, current - This item includes decrease (increase) for both Current and Non-current trade receivables 3. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets - This item includes decrease (increase) in both Current and Non-current Other Assets 4. Adjustments for other financial assets, current - This item includes decrease (increase) in Unbilled receivables and contract assets 5. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current - This item includes increase (decrease) in Current and Non-current Trade payables, Accrued Expenses, Provisions and Other Liabilities 6. Adjustments for other financial liabilities, non-current - This item includes increase (decrease) in Contract Liabilities 7. Other adjustments for which cash effects are investing or financing cash flow - This item includes Gain on sale of property, plant and equipment, net and Gain on derecognition of contingent consideration payable 8. Adjustments for unrealised foreign exchange losses gains - Includes Unrealized exchange (gain)/loss, net and exchange (gain)/loss on borrowings 9. Adjustments for Finance cost include Finance and other income, net of finance costs 10. Other adjustments for non-cash items - This item inlcudes Other non-cash items . Net cash flows from (used in) investing activities 11. Cash flows used in obtaining control of subsidiaries or other businesses Includes Payment for business acquisitions including deposits and escrow, net of cash acquired . 12. Other inflows (outflows) of cash includes Proceeds from security deposit for property, plant and equipment . Net cash flows from (used in) financing activities 13. Other inflows (outflows) of cash- This item includes Payment for contingent consideration and Payment for buyback of equity shares, including tax and transaction cost . 14. Dividend paid - This item includes 'Payment of dividend and Payment of dividend to Non-controlling interest holders .
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOtherExpenses: Software license expense for internal use
Software license expense for internal use
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: 1. Property, Plant and Equipments include Right to use of assets 2. Other non-current assets – includes Non-current tax assets (net) and Other non-current assets 3. Other non-current financial assets – includes Derivative assets and Other financial assets 4. Other current assets- includes Contract assets and Other Current Assets 5. Other current financial assets- includes Derivative assets, Unbilled receivables and Other financial assets 6. Other non-current liabilities – includes Non-current tax liabilities (net) and Other non-current liabilities 7. Other non-current financial liabilities – includes Lease liabilities, derivative liabilities and Other Financial Liabilities 8. Other current liabilities – includes Contract liabilities and Other Current liabilities 9. Other current financial liabilities – includes Derivative liabilities, Lease liabilities and Other financial liabilities
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Other Unallocable expenditure net of unallocable income includes Share of net profit/ (loss) of associate and joint venture accounted for using equity method and Finance and other income 2. Assets and liabilities used in the Company’s business are not identified to any of the operating segments, as these are used interchangeably between segments. Management believes that it is currently not practicable to provide segment disclosures relating to total assets and liabilities since a meaningful segregation of the available data is onerous.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillNotB: Remeasurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
Remeasurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillBeRe: Foreign currency translation differences relating to foreign operations
Reclassification of foreign currency translation differences on liquidation of subsidiaries to statement of profit and loss
Net change in time value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in intrinsic value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of forward contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of investment in debt instruments measured at fair value through OCI
